_header: Evil men God they seeken [Vuele men goid þe siechen]
_description: On the need of evil men to seek God, as other needy men seek their remedies, translating ‘Viri mali requirunt dominum…’ — five couplets

CamTCC323.First Lines:
Yuele men goid þe siechenSo deit þe seke þene
                    lecheso prisun of ransum to speken& so pilegrim gredi after
                    mete…
CamTCC323.Last Lines:
…Of herþe liche þinc is lutel prisannenint þe
                    blisse off heuene iþis
CamTCC323.Note: Written two verse lines per line in MS.
